Class ConvexHull

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.index.tree.metrical.mtreevariants.mktrees.mkcop.ConvexHull

  • public class ConvexHull
extends Object
    Holds the lower and upper hull for some values.
    Author:
    Elke Achtert

        x - the x-values of the points for which the lower and upper hull should be computed
